content: I'm just back from our 1-day working meeting on the ICT-48 RIA proposal on Foundations of Trustworthy AI. Thanks to everyone who was there - amazing energy, lots of useful work done, and a general feeling that we are off to great things :-)
Special thanks to @Fredrik Heintz , who is coordinating this proposal, and to @Luc De Raedt , who used his connections to look after local arrangements and generously sponsored coffee and lunch.

I'm just back from our 1-day working meeting on the ICT-48 RIA proposal on Foundations of Trustworthy AI. Thanks to everyone who was there - amazing energy, lots of useful work done, and a general feeling that we are off to great things :-)

Thanks, how does one help with the proposal writing?
